segments.text: What's wrong Melissa?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: A good friend of mine passed away the other day.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh no, I'm so sorry. What happened?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh they had some pretty progressive cancer,
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: metastasized and it was old and they knew that it wasn't looking good, but-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: That's the worst.  I'm so sorry.  Did you know him well?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah.  We were.  Pretty close.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: [BREATHING]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I am so sorry,  It's-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's the worst when they go like that. [GARBAGE] Was he young?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Kind of.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's hard to watch when it's painful for them, you know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Absolutely, absolutely.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's the think
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I just, I don't know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: There's no reason for it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: And he could of...  He was pretty awesome
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah?  What'd he do?  What did they do?  How'd you know him?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Uh,  We grew up together.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Is he an actor too, or-?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, he kind of did a lot of things, but we acted together, sometimes.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I feel really bad for his family, you know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yes of course, of course.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It must be really, really hard to lose a child.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Was he very close to his family?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah.  And they were really supportive, like through the whole process, but-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: [BREATHING]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I can't imagine what his- what his parents are going through.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Of course not.  You have no idea what it's like to lose a kid.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, I'm just going to miss him.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Of course. If there's anything I can do, you just let me know.  Okay?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Thank you.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Of course.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Is there a funeral planned? or-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, they're going to do some sort of memorial service or something.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Cool, Well, If you want me to go with you, I will.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Thanks.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: No problem.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's really bizarre, you know, when you know somebody really well, and then...
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: something happens and they die and it's like-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: really hard to imagine that like you're going to continue to live, and that person's just going to have stopped.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Right, it just doesn't make any sense, it's not real.  It doesn't feel real.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: [BREATHING]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Do you know what, it's going to pass,eventually, I mean it'll never pass, it'll always be there, and you'll always remember and everything like that, but you know.  It'll get easier I guess.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: That's the best way to put it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's hard to say good-bye.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Absolutely.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: [BREATHING]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Do you know what, if it was me that died, I'd really want you to be crying and being really upset too any way. So, I think you should definitely do this, because it's trying what it's supposed to be.
